document_data.name: Talking Stone
document_data.mainbody: '''''Talking stone''''' was a [[spell]] that allowed the caster to speak out of a stone.
document_data.Effects: The spell allowed the wizard to touch one stone, and through it, speak and listen out of any stone in Toril he'd previously touched. Neither stone could be enclosed in a magical ward, or the spell failed and was wasted. The spell lasted over ten minutes, more for casters with greater aptitude in the Art.
document_data.Components: Besides [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, two different kinds of stone, joined by a [[wire]], were consumed in the casting.
document_data.History: [[Azuth]] made this spell available through [[Elminster]] sometime prior to {{yearlink|1370}}.{{cite book/Secrets of the Magister|101}}
